total-transaction.title: Number of analyses per year
total-transaction.description: When you select a distributor, only the number of analyzes from that distributor's direct contract customers is displayed. When you select a customer company, only the number of analyzes from that customer company is displayed.

series.in-progress-tooltip: The client registration request has been completed, and this is the number of clients waiting for review.
series.rejection-tooltip: This is the number of clients whose screening was rejected due to registration regulations.
series.expire-tooltip: The effective date of the goodwill is less than 1 month, it is scheduled to be converted to non-contract, and the goodwill is limited.

security.title: Security
description: If you log in from a different location, the existing login session will be terminated
If 7 days have passed after the completion of the analysis, it will be automatically deleted

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
dist: • Contracting and sales to hospitals outside those that are registered via the platform are not permitted.
• Hospitals that do not have an official business registration certificate or have been registered as a client by another distributor cannot be registered.
• Proof of an actual sales meeting must be submitted before a client hospital registration is accepted.
• If the registered client hospital does not generate significant sales for the past 6 months, the hospital will be unregistered from the client list and re-registration will not be permitted.

• In order for hospitals to use ANRISK™, the terms of a standard contract must first be agreed upon. TALOS Corp. does not bear any legal or administrative liability arising from the non-compliance of this contract.

• When a hospital uploads patient information to ANRISK™, the agreement of the standard consent form must be obtained from the patient and be stored at the hospital. TALOS Corp. does not bear any legal or administrative liability arising from the non-compliance of this agreement.
